document_data.name: Tym Waterdeep Limited
document_data.mainbody: '''Tym Waterdeep Limited''', '''Tyme-Waterdeep''', '''Tyme Waterdeep, Ltd.''' or simply '''TWL''', as it was known among booksellers, was a large publishing business located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Structure: The publishing company was a large, converted warehouse. The building was four floors high.
document_data.Inhabitants: The building was owned and run by [[Justin Tym]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Tym Waterdeep Limited was famous throughout the ''Realms'' as the publisher of all of the works of [[Volothamp Geddarm]], including all his famous guide book, the ever-popular ''[[Cormyr: A Novel (in-universe)|Cormyr: A Novel]]'' and ''[[Evermeet: A Novel]]'' by [[Greenwood Grubb]]. In the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], in association with the [[Fellowship of Carters and Coachmen]] they published ''[[Volo's Waterdeep Enchiridion]]''.<ref>
